Package com.example.cincuentazo.model

package com.example.cincuentazo.model

  • Class
    Description
    AggressiveStrategy
    Aggressive strategy: chooses the card that leaves the highest valid total (higher risk).
    BotPlayer
    Runnable that executes the logic of a bot: - Waits between 2 and 4 seconds - Chooses a card using a strategy - Plays or gets eliminated
    BotStrategy
    Strategy interface: defines the card selection policy for a bot.
    Card
    This class represents a card in the game.
    CardFactory
    Simple factory for creating cards.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of cards in the game.
    GameFacade
    Simple facade that wraps operations exposed by GameModel.
    GameModel
    Main game model.
    GameTimer
    Game seconds counter thread.
    NoPlayableCardException
    Exception thrown when a player has no playable card.
    SimpleStrategy
    Simple strategy: chooses the first card that can be played without exceeding 50.
